channel.title: The Algorithmic Kill Chain on Joshua Dunlap
channel.description: Recent content in The Algorithmic Kill Chain on Joshua Dunlap

item.title: Part 1: Lavender — The AI Kill List Generator
item.description: How Israel's AI system marked 37,000 Palestinians for assassination with minimal human oversight

item.title: Part 2: The Gospel — Automating Structural Destruction
item.description: The automated infrastructure targeting system generating bombing sites faster than humans can verify

item.title: Part 3: Where's Daddy? — Engineering Familicide
item.description: Tracking Palestinian men to their family homes for strikes designed to maximize casualties

item.title: Part 4: Automated Apartheid — The Wolf Pack
item.description: How biometric surveillance and predictive profiling enforce racial control across historic Palestine

item.title: Part 5: The Machine Behind the Machine
item.description: Project Nimbus, Pegasus spyware, and the corporate infrastructure enabling algorithmic violence

item.title: Part 6: Algorithmic Occupation and the Imperative of Accountability
item.description: The cumulative impact of algorithmic warfare and paths toward accountability
